website_summaries.verdict: The Razer ManO'War is a powerful, but bulky, wireless gaming headset with excellent sound quality.
pros: Works with Mac, PC, and PS4
cons: Bulky headband and earpads can get uncomfortably warm

customer_reviews.title: Decent Comfort - poor design/build quality
customer_reviews.text: PROS: found the headset light and comfy to wear for long periods battery life excellent sound quality fantastic CONS: build quality - headset headband will snap off as it's suspended by 4 small plastic rods As the headband has snapped off (despite trying to super-glue it back on several times) I have to move on from this headset to something more robustly built. A shame as this design flaw ruins an otherwise decent pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: fs

customer_reviews.title: Overall sound quality is good but will sometimes auto turn off while in use
customer_reviews.text: Overall sound quality is good but will sometimes auto turn off while in use. 2 stars because of poor build quality on the thin plastic tabs holding the padded headband in place that is prone to breaking (mine broke after 1 month of use even though i was aware of how fragile it was and took care to be gentle with it)
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great headset but has a very serious design flaw, commonly resulting in a broken headband and unwearable headset as a result.
customer_reviews.text: Great headset until the thin pieces of plastic that connects the top head cushion to the band snapped. Simply wearing the headphones will run the risk of these small plastic clips snapping, and they can't be repaired or replaced. Without those clips, the headband will dig into the top of your head and be rendered unwearable without severe discomfort. Luckily for me, Amazon dealt with the issue and offered a refund with very little hassle. Shame really because the headphones are pretty fantastic otherwise, but design flaws from poor build quality is absolutely inexcusable at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless headset, average quality, poor battery, overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear though can get hot after prolonged usage. Battery is VERY poor even with frequent charging - worse still when the battery is low, the headset is determined to annoy the rest of your audio experience by playing a continuous annoying beeping sound. This could better be managed with the use of the accompanying software to display the warning or a less intrusive led flash. Build quality is below average for the price point, they will not tolerate much movement before they feel they are about to snap. Paint finish will not stand up to normal wear. These are good to accompany other razor products but are 100% overpriced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: First and Probably the Last Razer product I'll willingly buy
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that I love Destiny, so when I wanted to buy a new set of Headphones, I was looking for ones that would compliment my gameplay, Saw those and that was it, since I mainly play destiny, I thought a Destiny 2 themed headphone set would be perfect, ... well ... that was a disappointment, They feel cheap (for a 100+ pound pricetag) and the sound quality could've easily been much, much better, They are however light, so that's a plus, and they're not all that bad to look at ... sadly, that's not their intended purpose, so although they're 2 good points, they're completely irrelevant,
customer_reviews.author: Abbass

customer_reviews.title: Top Product - Expensive but would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Top Draw product. Easy Plug & Play with great sound. The range of these are brilliant. I can walk around my house without losing signal. Sound quality is good and can be edited using the Razer Synapse software with ease. Very comfortable - Large ear cups fit over your ears and are very soft feel. Microphone is good quality - Not had any problems using this on Ventrillo, Team Speak or Skype. Would give it an OK rating for recording but who doesn't use a specialist recording microphone for that eh?!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: A solid headset
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headphones, look nice, good audio quality, no complaints on mic quality and definitely get the job done. Some things I have noticed in the months I have owned it are there are quite a few plasticky creaks and squeaks that I hoped would break-in over time but no change thus far. And also if the volume is lowered too much it only plays through one speaker so I usually end up having to lower the volume of apps and games in their settings rather than simply lowering the volume on the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Battery life and bluetooth range are worse than the steelseries wireless H headset I was using ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery life and bluetooth range are worse than the steelseries wireless H headset I was using before. There are no software options to disable the stupidly annoying low battery beep. The razer synapse software not only caused my windows 10 to bsod, but also lacks options for cycling the rgb led to a few colours I like. I wanted a rainbow to match my corsair k70 setup, but I can only make it breathe different colours slowly (colour fades from one to another over 30 seconds) or have 1 static colour of your choice.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Got the ManO'War after researching about it for my own ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the ManO'War after researching about it for my own personal use as I wanted to upgrade my own headset after having it for a few years, however the first one arrived broken as it would not even turn on, even after 20 hours of charging, then the replacement order also arrived broken as there was consistent static noise in the headset upon turning it on, even when not plugged into the PC wirelessly with the USB, took this problem up with Razer support first and they also informed me that the headset was again broken and had an internal error and suggested nothing but to ask for another replacement/refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jordon

customer_reviews.title: Ignore negative reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Headset is by far the comfiest I’ve ever owned. The battery life is great, but can also be used whilst charging with the usb cable provided (I’ve switched off the RGB). Sound quality is great also. As for people complaining over the “design flaw” with the headband, you’d have to be very heavy handed or neglectful of the headset to break it...
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: ~A year on Review~
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headset, amazing battery life. 1 issue, if you turn the headset to only have 1 ear on, for example, a partner is moaning because you are spending too long playing counter strike, the plastic headband digs in and it's very comfortable (normal use is very comfortable)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Like uncomfortable headsets? Then this is for you!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m just gonna be brutally honest here, this headset is terrible!! I don’t mean in terms of sound or microphone quality, the plastic headband is just awful, it’s so uncomfortable on top of your head and rubs against your scalp, both sound and microphone quality were good which is why I’m giving it 2 stars, I’m already in the process of returning it to get something more comfortable and I only received it 2 days ago!
customer_reviews.author: Ross Allan

customer_reviews.title: Needs more wireless!
customer_reviews.text: After using the headset consistently ever since I got it which is a little around a month or more now and well the only down side for this is I have to stick it on charge every night which isn't really their fault but when you get up and switch it on to be reminded you have 2% battery it's a pain to realise this.
customer_reviews.author: Bloodshot_pico

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality - cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Had to return 2 x and in the end got a refund. Look great but the build quality is poor. The plastic is cheap with the actual headphone speaker (where it disintegrated) and on the top where the cushion is held in place by 4 pieces of plastic that break. I like Razer products but I can't recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Christopher Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Really good headset very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Really good headset very comfy,the microphone is very good and I get a further wireless connection than my BT router. It does feel slightly cheap thanks to most of the outer shell being plastic but otherwise it's all metal underneath. Otherwise it is a very comfy headset the software is easy to use and is updated frequently. For anyone having trouble with the headset not appearing in the Synapse software just run synapse as admin and make sure the headset is turned on.
customer_reviews.author: LPDalgetty

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality built
customer_reviews.text: Really poor quality built headset the headband on the top snapped after only a few months of having the headset, On the other hand the sounds and micphone are good quality. Needless to say I got a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Poor experience
customer_reviews.text: Trust me it is non 7.1 even not virtual 7.1 only normal surround sounds, it is an destiny edition but non tournament because it sounds just like my apple EarPods. If you like what it looks like and just so, then buy it; if not, then don’t! Ps: don’t trust the description, it is non 7.1. At razer official site it didn’t even mention. But others mano’war headsets has. The analog cable isn’t same.
customer_reviews.author: Teo Kee Chong

customer_reviews.title: Full of breaking plastic
customer_reviews.text: It snapped, mostly made of plastic. Sounds great but it survived 7 months? Didn’t get a great deal of use, the plastic headset didn’t seem last long at all. For the money it’s pretty disgusting
customer_reviews.author: harvey stamley

customer_reviews.title: Loved it... until it broke...
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice headset, but part of the headrest on the top has broken off after a week of use... not very happy with that to be honest. I'm going to try to see if I can get it fixed under warranty, as it is now uncomfortable to wear... Hopefully I can get a repair / new one and then re-write this review, as I was really liking this headset until it broke!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and comfortable, but cheap build quality that broke after 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the product, I loved it. Not only was the audio clarity really good, it fit me perfectly. However, after 3 months of VERY CARING use, the front connector to the top headband broke. I was taking it off when I heard a snap and did not realise till later on the same day. If not for the cheap build quality, this would easily have been a 4/5 star product. Luckily, Amazon have sent me a replacement, and I am hoping that the headband breaking was a one off incident.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Costan

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: great headset . mic super sensitive . used pretty much every day i believe i take care of my stuff . my previous headset razer krakken lasted me 2 years but this broke in 9 months , headband broke . after inspection realised its just cheap plastic they used . wouldn't recommend if you want to keep it for long
customer_reviews.author: Kristians

customer_reviews.title: The headset is good, the sound is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The headset is good, the sound is amazing, battery life is long, however... The whole thing is let down by the build quality on the headband, it's held together with extremely thin and flimsy plastic that WILL break after 1-2 months of use, so instead of a comfy headband on your head you'll have hard plastic which ends up hurting after long period of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: + sound is lag-free and very good + mic is very good as well - I ...
customer_reviews.text: + sound is lag-free and very good + mic is very good as well - I have not measured properly how long battery last, but that 14h does not sound right, I have to charge them every day - the on/off switch has like a 3 seconds delay which is an annoyance - after I bought them I read that the plastic on top breaks rather sooner then later, so now I'm waiting for that moment :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... at the headrest I now have to wear a hate to even use these and they still hurt my ...
customer_reviews.text: Please listen to be before you buy these there are shockingly uncomfortable and my set have broken at the headrest I now have to wear a hat to even use these and they still hurt my head The sound is great and they look amazing but the fact that after use my head actually hurts from the indent in my head!
customer_reviews.author: Callum

customer_reviews.title: Not good, broken headband.
customer_reviews.text: Had headphones under a month, snapped within 3 weeks.. plastic construction weak, due to using plastic as the flexible headband without any steel reinforcement... would not recommend.. sound good, but design is flawed.
customer_reviews.author: alan kelly

customer_reviews.title: Geat sound quality but weak headband
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent headset for sound quality but build quality is poor. The flimsy headband on mine broke when I was taking them off. The two plastic side bands are pathetically weak and certainly not up to the quality expected for the price paid. Perhaps later versions are of better build quality and strength but I would avoid buying this model until this is proven through use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart very quickly. Just seemingly through general usage. I have a stand for my headsets when I'm not using them. The act of opening them to put them on my head seemed to wear it down and it snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect PC gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headset, really comfortable and sound is clear. it works perfectly on windows 7 and 10. The mic is really quite nice, mic is spot on with the sensitivity. Only thing is the auto switch off after 5mins of no sound/mic usuage and they can't be wired.
customer_reviews.author: Slyvampy

customer_reviews.title: Good headset just a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Overall the headset is pretty good, I’ve had no problems with it however, some people have had problems with the headset breaking. I have not had this problem and I’m pretty rough with the headset. If you buy this product just look after it otherwise you’ll lose out on a very good quality headset.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Magee-Laird

customer_reviews.title: It is a all round amazing headset great sound quality and amazing comfort just as ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a all round amazing headset great sound quality and amazing comfort just as they said but my one downside i think to this headset is the 7.1 surround sound only works on pc but the sound quality on PS4 is great the best i yet i have heard in a headset
customer_reviews.author: Dennis mc ginley

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great sound and decent microphone
customer_reviews.text: Had these for 8 months. Good product, great sound and decent microphone, nice feel and doesnt hurt after prolongued use. But, for the price of £120 odd I am very disapointed they lasted this long. Not sure im going back to more razer headsets after the next one I buy... such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: warning before you buy
customer_reviews.text: the headset support that is a cushion for your head has very flimsy supports and breaks easily if not treat carefully after only 9 months the headset support broke and makes the headset uncomfortable but overall this is a great product and the sound quality is brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've had Razer headsets before and I'm not a fan of wireless anything but I had to take the leap to this as I was sick of getting tangled in cables. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a decent headset
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN after 7 months, BUY FROM RAZER STORE DIRECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the device from Amazon via Realtime Distribution. Item's battery failed to charge after a few months of 2-3hr gameplay per usage. If you ARE GOING TO BUY this, spend the extra and buy it from THE RAZER WEBSTORE. They will cover the warranty, not by 3rd Party companies listed here.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Johnson

customer_reviews.title: By far the best headset i've used
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an upgrade for my Razer Kraken Pro V2 which already had very good sound quality that I hadn't experienced from other headphones before. The ManO'war 7.1 headset are even better, with better sound isolation and the added ability of surround sound audio this headset is by far the best headset I've used.
customer_reviews.author: s neal

customer_reviews.title: Real review  MUST READ
customer_reviews.text: The software it needs is outdated and is almost unusable battery life 5-7 hours when using mic and headphones wireless is good disconnects randomly sometimes making me try sort it out mid game just go for a different headset
customer_reviews.author: Luke shaw

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant headset. Best I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headset. Best I've ever owned. Sounds amazing. Band does feel light, I wouldn't say flimsy as other people have said. It won't break if you're not stupid with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cian O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Good, but flimsy plastic
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headset for quality and comfort, but just 1 month after my warranty the plastic headband snapped as i picked them up to put over my head. Not the middle head rest part, the arm with the wire in the middle :( now they are loose and superglue wont cut it, probably going to have to add an extra bit of material to reattach.
customer_reviews.author: Rhys

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product. Great sound quality, but the headband broke after 6 months for no reason. Not well built. Common complaint,
customer_reviews.author: Cian

customer_reviews.title: Sound is amazing. The 7
customer_reviews.text: Mic is crystal clear. Sound is amazing. The 7.1 Surround Sound is the best I've heard from any pair of headphones! If you have a small head like mine, it does take a while to get used to because they are very big!
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Neale

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: They handle everything at a much louder setting. It does seem like there's something missing that you can't put your finger on, but they're pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and overall quality is good.Virtual 7.1 is remarkable.But plastic interacts with your head at the top of product.Also driver case is quite heavy,so it may slip of your head while you are listening Tool 😀
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Headset, I purchased these for my Brother for his Birthday and he loves them. They sound incredible and presented very nicely in their packaging. Definitely upped his game!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, absolutely trash
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, absolutely trash. If you want my suggestion as a gamer for years buy the Razer Kraken 7.1 but beware as they break easily. Microphone picks up EVERYTHING unlike the Kraken and the quality is pretty much a 7/10 ONLY if compared to the Kraken, otherwise pretty bad itself.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: Insanely great headset, great wireless capabilities, I can literally go down to the local Tesco and get my lunch while I listen to my freinds dying on fortnite!!!
customer_reviews.author: harry harvey

customer_reviews.title: Heavy price tag for average performance...
customer_reviews.text: Not loud at all, noise cancellation is pretty good, but as to be expected with such a heavy price tag
customer_reviews.author: Arc Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loves them, for the fact he has 3 different pairs of gaming headphones and he hasn’t used the other since he got these I’m sure they are great!
customer_reviews.author: charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Mic faulty
customer_reviews.text: 9 month in they have been great but they have now a microphone fault people saying it a buzzing sound when I use the mic. Raising a faulty ticket see what response I get
customer_reviews.author: the ghost

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic Headband snapped
customer_reviews.text: Product was great for a while but the headband is made of a cheap plastic which has snapped after very careful use.
customer_reviews.author: wobblesflame

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, but not quite as good as I expected for ~£100
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K Pugh

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The mic quality for this headset is absolutely appalling, apple earphones provide better mic quality. Whatever you do, DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS PRODUCT WHATSOEVER
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for a wireless headset.
customer_reviews.text: My eldest (18) has been very impressed with this headset since we bought it for him as a Christmas present. He has had numerous others but rates this the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Not long term headset.
customer_reviews.text: Has been working well for about 8 months now, great quality mic and audio but the top has now broken, and the ear pieces are starting to come apart due to the amount of use its had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just trying to be loud
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a fan of the quality of sound, I felt like it was just trying to be loud without any importance on the 7.1 surround sound or audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible build quality.
customer_reviews.text: This headset has fallen apart almost exactly six months after I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: David John Penman

customer_reviews.title: Not very robust
customer_reviews.text: Headphone band snapped, coincidentally just after the warranty had expired. Fuming.
customer_reviews.author: The avid reader

customer_reviews.title: What’s the warranty for this?!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this from September 7th 2017 will I be able to get it repaired as The head cushion has snapped or get it replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mckerney

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: headband was shocking, broke very quickly, extremely tacky feel to the headset, WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: james commander

customer_reviews.title: broken mic
customer_reviews.text: came with a broken mic, no replacement nice one you goons
customer_reviews.author: piotr

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: My headset came and does not charge no matter what making it useless practically a paper weight
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sound and super easy to keep charged best headset i own!!
customer_reviews.author: Carole-King

customer_reviews.title: Bad headband
customer_reviews.text: Cheap headband weak plastic lasted 6months however not nice to wear for long periods of time
customer_reviews.author: Harry Primiceri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound but the top part is fragile and will break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality both mic and sound but broke after about 4 months from just taking it off my head
customer_reviews.author: Mrs June Bray

customer_reviews.title: Decent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very big headphones they fall off my head. But not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Connor aimson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound and mic but feels a bit quality low in ergonomics for the price
customer_reviews.author: Mr Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Poor built quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good, the battery could be better but unfortunately the build quality is not good for this price. After 7 months of light usage, the hear foams started to peel of.
customer_reviews.author: Vital João Vilarinho

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The audio is okay but the mic does not work. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: daniel m.

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Uncomfortable after long periods. Lasted 4 months before it would no longer charge.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: the sound was ok but the mic was terrible i downloaded all the required things i adjusted the ...
customer_reviews.text: the sound was ok but the mic was terrible i downloaded all the required things i adjusted the mic it still sounded bad in games and talking platforms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Music/gaming
customer_reviews.text: One of the best headsets I've ever owned. Great for sound and bass.
customer_reviews.author: Mateusz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good mic and headset. A little uncomfortable and heavy
customer_reviews.author: Hazza77

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this headset. It has a known fault. Go online and do your research, the headrest is made of plastic which breaks off over a short period of time. Look online and see for yourself, there are also videos on YouTube. I don't normally write negative comments urging people not to purchase but this is extremely bad. I'm currently dealing with Warranty. They have asked me to go back to Amazon to get a refund or replacement. Razer doesn't want to deal with it directly. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Lee Louis Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, good looks, terrible build quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these back in Sept '16. They look good, sound good, but the build quality is terrible for the price of £170. The pad on the headband is attached with very thin and flimsy plastic mounts. Normal use saw these break after a few months and I keep my headphones on a proper stand and they don't leave the office. They are all plastic and on build quality alone I cannot recommend these headphones. Once the pad comes off it wont go back on and the headphones become far to uncomfortable to use at all.
customer_reviews.author: JonD73

customer_reviews.title: Sound and comfort are both fantastic The EQ gives you a great ability to fine ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound and comfort are both fantastic The EQ gives you a great ability to fine tune resulting in one of the best sounding gaming headsets I've used (and I've used a lot) for both music and games and the giant ear cushions are like two big marshmallows. The microphone is also fantastic with good options for tweaking. Now the many stories of quality control issues, particularly the headband that is apparently prone to creaking and/breaking seemed to have been ironed out, or at the very least they arent problems I've encountered and believe me I checked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best headset I have ever had (sound wise). Sound quality is amazing. However, not very comfortable if you are bald. Also; only had about 3 months & centre piece of headset broke. Still usable & would ask for a replacement but then I would be without a headset until new one arrived. Think more padding on these headsets would be better; or even some sort of wrap round cushioning designed for headsets would make it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: GANDY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for XB1
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Xbox One. Son claims the quality is excellent.... and judging by the fact I can't remember seeing him without them on... they must be comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: Canuck's Fan

customer_reviews.title: PC ONLY
customer_reviews.text: I brought this headset for my ps4. And as you have to synchronize the headset on pc. Absolutely brilliant sound and surround sound is perfect. So now the heartbreaking part i plug them into my ps4 the sound is very low and no surround sound . So if anyone knows different PLEASE let me know as on the pc the sound was beautiful
customer_reviews.author: terry davies

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant pair of headphones, can charge for a short time and they last for ages. Definitely worth buying the wireless version. Amazing sound quality and very comfortable and easy setup. The headphones are quite large though.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Razer skipped quality control.
customer_reviews.text: The headband WILL brake after 2 months of average use. Its held on by a insanely skinny piece of plastic. Some black tape will do the trick though. Its a shame because other than that its quite a nice headset..... also it goes into sleep mode every 10 mins if you arent playing sound which is so annoying when your surfing the web and get 10 seconds into a video before you realize your headset is turned off. And the range is really weird, some days i can walk around my house and clean with it on and some days it barely works 2 metres from my PC.
customer_reviews.author: Owen E.

customer_reviews.title: Razor Man OWar.
customer_reviews.text: What a sound, virtual 7.1 is excellent, so comfortable, they are big though but having said that, you hardly know they are there, even after hours of play. Best headphones I have ever invested in. USB interface is really good, extension cable adds that bit extra so as to reach to my sofa. Top product well pleased with buy after a lot of research.
customer_reviews.author: Novicebuild

customer_reviews.title: Could be amazing, but cheap build quiality ruins it
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional Audio quality, Mic is decent but the build quiality is simply disgusting. First pair, the left ear cup went quiet after about a month of use as there must have been a loose connection. Amazon replaced these no problem, but the second pairs headband snapped after less than 3 weeks worth of use. Great sounding headset, let down by cheap plastic that 'holds' it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth A Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Quality Construction and excellent sound quality, would recommend this headset to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Josh Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: FLAWED PRODUCT! AVOID!
customer_reviews.text: Useless, headstraps broke after a couple on months. Razer RMA pointed me to Amazon for a replacement, however this function does not exist. Unsure how I get my headset replaced...
customer_reviews.author: Sean Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Sound great but some issues
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy setup. Amazing realistic and clear surround sound effect. Cons: They are large and heavy enough to become uncomfortable with extended use. Feel flimsily built. Worrying rattle when I pick them up. It sounds like something has broken loose inside but they still work.
customer_reviews.author: A. Angus

customer_reviews.title: Snapped..
customer_reviews.text: It's sad to give one star as the sound quality is amazing. The sound quality is meaningless however when the headset snaps.. I don't know what they were thinking when they constructed a head rest supported by 4 tiny plastic bridges. Mine actually broke within a week. I highly recommend that you invest your money on a different headset, don't make the same mistake I made.

customer_reviews.title: No issues great headset.
customer_reviews.text: no issues with the headset. comfortable. sound quality is good. battery life is good. had them 4 months so far and build quality is fine. Read reviews where they are breaking because of being made from plastic. A lot of headsets are made from plastic. Just look after them. I use these everyday for Gaming, Music and TV. Wireless range reaches throughout most rooms and part of the garden.
